FestivalPlanner.GUI

Class CommonNodeRetriever

  • java.lang.Object
    • FestivalPlanner.GUI.CommonNodeRetriever

  • public class CommonNodeRetriever
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains static methods for retrieval of common GUI elements such as the helpMenu, since it is used in both modules of our software.

    • Field Summary

      • processEditGUIStage

        public static void processEditGUIStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage,
                                       javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane)
        Applies a variety of properties to a stage given as a parameter. It also sets the scene of this stage to a new instance of Scene with the gridPane as the parameter.
        Parameters:
        stage - stage to apply properties to
        gridPane - gridPane to set the new Scene to

        public static javafx.scene.layout.VBox getShowEditorVBox()

        a newly created VBox

      • getShowEditorMainPane

        public static javafx.scene.layout.VBox getShowEditorMainPane(javafx.scene.layout.VBox artistVBox,
                                                             javafx.scene.layout.VBox artistAtEventSetterVBox)
        Creates a VBox that contains the parts of the GUI responsible for selecting a podium for an event.
        Parameters:
        artistVBox - a VBox containing all the current artists.
        artistAtEventSetterVBox - a VBox that contains tools to be able to set witch artists are at an event.
        Returns:
        a VBox with the parts of the GUI responsible for selecting a podium for an event

      • getUnselectedColorPickerStage

        static javafx.stage.Stage getUnselectedColorPickerStage(javafx.stage.Stage ownerStage)
        Returns a stage with a fully setup GUI for the ColorPickerGUI. This method is used for the unselected shows.
        Parameters:
        ownerStage - stage that should be set as the owner of the new stage
        Returns:
        stage for ColorPickerGUI

      • getSelectedColorPickerStage

        static javafx.stage.Stage getSelectedColorPickerStage(javafx.stage.Stage ownerStage)
        Returns a stage with a fully setup GUI for the ColorPickerGUI. This method is used for the selected shows.
        Parameters:
        ownerStage - stage that should be set as the owner of the new stage
        Returns:
        stage for ColorPickerGUI

      • getColorPickerStage

        private static javafx.stage.Stage getColorPickerStage(javafx.stage.Stage ownerStage,
                                                      javafx.scene.control.ColorPicker colorPicker)
        Opens a windows / popup to select a color. ColorPicker is given.
        Parameters:
        ownerStage - The head stage to open this window from
        colorPicker - The ColorPicker that is used for picking a color
        Returns:
        A new window to select a color
